org.knime.core.data

Interface AdapterValue

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DataValue
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    RWAdapterValue
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdapterCell

    public interface AdapterValue
extends DataValue
    Interface defining access on AdapterCell.
    Since:
    2.7
    Author:
    Bernd Wiswedel, KNIME.com, Zurich, Switzerland
    No public API: not to be extended by clients
    This interface is not intended to be extended by clients.
    No public API: not to be implemented by clients
    Use AdapterCell instead.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.knime.core.data.DataValue

        DataValue.UtilityFactory

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface org.knime.core.data.DataValue

        UTILITY

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <V extends DataValue>
      V      		 getAdapter(Class<V> valueClass)
      Returns the value in this adapter for the given value class.
      <V extends DataValue>
      MissingValue      		 getAdapterError(Class<V> valueClass)
      Returns a missing value object if there is one for the given value class.
      Map<Class<? extends DataValue>,DataCell> getAdapterMap()
      Returns a read-only map of all adapters.
      <V extends DataValue>
      boolean      		 isAdaptable(Class<V> valueClass)
      Returns whether this adapter value is an adapter for the given value class.

    • Method Detail

      • isAdaptable

        <V extends DataValue> boolean isAdaptable(Class<V> valueClass)
        Returns whether this adapter value is an adapter for the given value class. By convention an adapter is also adaptable to all value classes that it is compatible with (i.e. that the cell implementation implements).
        Parameters:
        valueClass - a value class
        Returns:
        true if it is adaptable, false otherwise
        See Also:
        DataType.isCompatible(Class)

      • getAdapter

        <V extends DataValue> V getAdapter(Class<V> valueClass)
        Returns the value in this adapter for the given value class. The value is also returned if this adapter is compatible with the given value class.
        Parameters:
        valueClass - a value class
        Returns:
        a value object or null if an adapter error is stored instead of a value
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if this value is not adaptable to the given value class
        See Also:
        getAdapterError(Class), DataType.isCompatible(Class)

      • getAdapterError

        <V extends DataValue> MissingValue getAdapterError(Class<V> valueClass)
        Returns a missing value object if there is one for the given value class. If no error is available null is returned.
        Parameters:
        valueClass - a value class
        Returns:
        a missing value or null
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if this value is not adaptable to the given value class

      • getAdapterMap

        Map<Class<? extends DataValue>,DataCell> getAdapterMap()
        Returns a read-only map of all adapters. The mapped cells are special instances with blob support. This method is not meant to be used outside the KNIME core plugin.
        Returns:
        a read-only adapter map
        No public API: not to be referenced by clients
        This method is not intended to be referenced by clients.
